source_text: Upon exercise of the Option, S2 will hold an 80% interest in the Projects, and Valkea will retain a 20% interest. If a party's joint venture interest is diluted below 10%, it will automatically convert to a 2% net smelter return royalty.
additional_details: The royalty is triggered if Valkea Resources Corp.'s (Valkea) joint venture interest (initially 20%) is diluted below 10%. In this scenario, Valkea would receive the 2% NSR royalty, and S2 Resources Corp. (S2) would pay it.
